what: resmush: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case) — resmush-package
title: resmush: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case) — resmush-package
resmush: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case) — resmush-package
Optimize a local file — resmush_file
text: Optimize local images using reSmush.API. Note default parameters function outfile = file overwrites local file. See Examples.

title: Optimize a local file — resmush_file
code: resmush_file(file, outfile = file, qlty = 92, verbose = FALSE)

title: Optimize a local file — resmush_file
text: file Path local file. reSmush can optimize following image files: png jpg gif bmp tif outfile Path optimized file store disk. default, override file specified file. qlty affects jpg files. Integer 0 100 indicating optimization level. optimal results use vales 90. verbose Logical. TRUE displays summary results.

title: Optimize a local file — resmush_file
text: Writes disk optimized file API call successful. case, (invisibly) data frame summary process returned well.

title: Optimize a local file — resmush_file
code: # \donttest{ png_file <- system.file("extimg/example.png", package = "resmush")  # For example, writes to a temp file tmp_png <- tempfile(fileext = ".png")  # Silently returns a data frame png_res <- resmush_file(png_file, outfile = tmp_png) png_res[, -c(1:2)] #>   src_size dest_size compress_ratio notes #> 1 239.9 Kb   70.7 Kb          70.5% OK ;)  # Use with jpg and parameters jpg_file <- system.file("extimg/example.jpg", package = "resmush")  # For example, writes to a temp file tmp_jpg <- tempfile(fileext = ".jpg")  # Silently returns a data frame resmush_file(jpg_file, outfile = tmp_jpg, verbose = TRUE) #> ✔ Optimizing D:/a/_temp/Library/resmush/extimg/example.jpg: #> ℹ Effective compression ratio: 17.2% #> ℹ Current size: 83.2 Kb (was 100.4 Kb) #> ℹ Output: C:\Users\RUNNER~1\AppData\Local\Temp\RtmpEDnCuO\filebf8402e60b8.jpg resmush_file(jpg_file, outfile = tmp_jpg, verbose = TRUE, qlty = 10) #> ✔ Optimizing D:/a/_temp/Library/resmush/extimg/example.jpg: #> ℹ Effective compression ratio: 93.6% #> ℹ Current size: 6.4 Kb (was 100.4 Kb) #> ℹ Output: C:\Users\RUNNER~1\AppData\Local\Temp\RtmpEDnCuO\filebf8402e60b8.jpg # }
